title: Four people killed after gunman opens fire in a bar in Kansas
text:
Four people have been killed and at least five others injured after a gunman, who is reportedly still at large, entered a bar in Kansas City and started shooting.

Local media is reporting that the incident took place shortly before 1:30am within the vicinity of the Tequila KC bar on Central Avenue in downtown Kansas. The attacker was armed with a handgun and the victims were all Hispanic males, according to 41 Action News.

The suspect has not yet been detained and further information has yet to be made available.

This is what the scene looks like from Baltimore and Central Ave. @41actionnewspic.twitter.com/EMTLFc2nUV — Nick Starling (@NickStarlingTV) October 6, 2019

9 people were shot at a local bar in KCK. Four are dead, five were sent to the hospital. Police are waiting for a search warrant to get inside. @41actionnews@AFGutierrezpic.twitter.com/vU0fY33gnt — Jordan Betts (@JordanBettsTV) October 6, 2019

MORE AS IT HAPPENS
description: Four people have been killed and at least five others injured after a gunman, who is reportedly still at large, entered a bar in Kansas City and started shooting.
